Description:
Alerts on Metasploit host's authentications on the domain.

Author: Chakib Gzenayi (@Chak092), Hosni Mribah
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Metasploit SMB Authentication
Query: sourcetype='windows-security' eql select * from _source_ where (((eventid = '4625' or eventid = '4624') and logontype = '3' and authenticationpackagename = 'ntlm' and workstationname re '^[A-Za-z0-9]{16}$') or (eventid = '4776' and workstation re '^[A-Za-z0-9]{16}$'))
